subject: Re: [junit] Fail Tests on write to System.out
msgSnippet: Thanks Dawid ... limiting the amount of output to a configurable number of bytes is pretty cool but as you said, I have to touch every testclass to make them
messageBody:
Thanks Dawid
You do need to have a common superclass or repeat the rule annotation on every class this should be applied to, unfortunately.
limiting the amount of output to a configurable number of bytes is pretty cool but as you said, I have to touch every testclass to make them obey the rules. Though, there seems to be no better way. So far, thanks a lot, the whole TestRuleLimitSysouts class is very interesting.

-- 
"Shhh.... I'm charging my laser."
